attributes.action: instruct the Home Office to order the Police to compulsorily fit "alcolocks" to the vehicles of anyone who fails a breathalyser (or blood or urine) test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As I understand it "alcolocks" somehow prevent vehicles from being driven if the driver is over the limit.  Personally I would like them to be fitted to all vehicles, to prevent any driver causing the devastation which results from drink-driving, but I suppose that would be considered excessive so I hope that the suggestion of fitting them to vehicles of those drivers already guilty of drink-driving will attract support.
